title: Update Asset Location
description: A mobile piece of equipment, like a generator, has been moved to a new location on the project site. Its location must be updated in the asset register.

tasks.description: Identify the asset that was moved.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the generator's asset ID.

tasks.description: Get the new GPS coordinates for the asset.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent obtains the new coordinates from a handheld GPS device.

tasks.description: Update the location field in the asset's record with the new coordinates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the asset's location in the system.
